scenario_text.value:
...Um, maybe it’s over here? Hmmm... No, not
here either...

Oh, what do I do... If I take too long,
Labramon might...!
Aoi! Jeez, there you are!
We found you!

Takuma, Agumon! I’m sorry for going off on my
own like that...

We’re just happy you’re okay. But from the
looks of things...

I don’t see a kit anywhere... Maybe they
don’t even have a nurse’s office here?

I don’t see anything like it around here, but
I’m sure there’s one somewhere else!
Yeah! There’s just gotta be!

Now that I think about it, one time I got
treated in the faculty room when I was a kid.

Ah, yes! There might be a first-aid kit in
the faculty room.

You’re right! Maybe we can find one there.
Let’s go check it out together!

I think I should look around here a little
longer, just in case. Could <color=#B41919>you two</color> go look?

Don’t worry, I’ll be right behind you.
...Oh! Be careful around the windows!
Huh? What’s wrong with the windows?

They’re sticky for some reason... I can’t
seem to see anything that explains it though.

Okay, I hear you. Thanks for telling me!
Be careful around here, okay?
Awriiight, let’s move on out!

(She’s right, I don’t see anything on the
window. But what if I use my camera...?)
Shee-hee-hee-hee...
Hmm? What did you say?
Who, me? I didn’t say anything.
Is that right? My ears must be deceiving me.

(I’d better bring that first-aid kit back to
Labramon as soon as I can!)
(I’ll take some pictures around here...!)
Um, Takuma...

I’m sure you’re curious, but can we stick to
the search now? I’m worried about Labramon.

It bothers me too, but we can always come
back later!
Yeah, let’s find that first-aid kit for now!
